entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of drizzle and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
